LanguageData.AF_BaseFerianThought_Trait.stages.0.desc: Watching the daily activities of these alien creatures is also a pleasant pastime~ \n\nWhen are we gonna get another batch.
LanguageData.AF_BaseFerianThought_Hediff.stages.0.des:
The sydaily crystal on the head of the Ferian connects to the ship they're on, 

Death is like load a SAVE to them. 

It would be the only thing on the Rim that could show off their technological prowess.
